org.openimaj.video.translator

Class VideoTranslator<INPUT extends Image<?,INPUT>,OUTPUT extends Image<?,OUTPUT>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.video.Video<OUTPUT>
      • org.openimaj.video.translator.VideoTranslator<INPUT,OUTPUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    INPUT -
    OUTPUT -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<OUTPUT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FImageToMBFImageVideoTranslator, MBFImageToFImageVideoTranslator

    public abstract class VideoTranslator<INPUT extends Image<?,INPUT>,OUTPUT extends Image<?,OUTPUT>>
extends Video<OUTPUT>
    A video translator is a video processor where the input and output frame types may be different. This means that no processing can take place in place but new frames must be returned.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VideoTranslator(Video<INPUT> in)
      Construct a new VideoTranslator that will translate the given input video.
